sentence.Network_en: We would become the Redeemer theto clear away all of the evil.

sentence.Network_cn: 基督是我们的代求者,但祂同时也是普天下人的代赎者.

sentence.Network_en: Now , just like the MARV, the Redeemer can be garrisoned with infantry.
sentence.Network_cn: 和MARV类似, 救赎者也可以进驻步兵.

entry.def: In the Christian religion, the Redeemer is Jesus Christ.
